author: Matthew Beedham
title: Polestar begins production of its new EV despite coronavirus concerns
description:
Given global circumstances right now, it's not exactly the best time to be launching a new car. However, Volvo subsidiary Polestar, has actually begun production this week.

content:
Given global circumstances right now, its not exactly the best time to be launching a new car. However, Volvo subsidiary Polestar isnt letting the situation get in the way.
